origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceRegulationAPI.get_recent_policies', 'description': 'This function provides the most recent financial regulatory policies based on the specified region and year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which the policies are required, e.g., China, USA.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the policies are required.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policies', 'description': 'A list of recent financial regulatory policies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceRegulationAPI.get_recent_policies, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'China', 'year'是'2023'.
